document.id: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2010-9
document.heading: Reclassifying Property on South Amphlett Blvd. from C4-1 (Service Commercial) and R2 (Two Family Dwellings) to C3-2 (Regional Community Commercial) and Amending the City's Zoning Map to Reflect the Reclassification (The San Mateo Times Site)

citations.citation: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2010-9
